argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cxp0d.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | cxpefd.2 | |- ( ph -> A =/= 0 ) |
| 3 |  | cxpefd.3 | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | #P_cxpef | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ A =/= 0 /\ B e. CC ) -> ( A ^c B ) = ( exp ` ( B x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( A ^c B ) = ( exp ` ( B x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) |
